main.name: Manoj More
main.description: Working at NeoSOFT Technologies as a Lead software engineer (NodeJS) across the range of our products
main.bio: Throughout my life, I’ve approached every challenge with enthusiasm, creativity, and ceaseless desire to achieve success. This passion and drive have paved the way to countless opportunities, unique experiences and exceptional relationships both personally and professionally.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.school: Pune University Computer Science Department, Pune.
education.description: Here I have completed my Master of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

I attended the Bachelors of Computer Science. This was a very hands-on experience focused more on building projects than general theory. Here I have learned lots of programming languages such as C, C++, Java, Data structure, and much more.

work.title: Lead Software Enginner
work.description: Here I'm working as a lead software engineer, I have worked extensively with NodeJS as well as AWS. Environment​: ​JavaScript, NodeJS, Express. Responsibilities: 1) Creating Scalable applications using NodeJS 2) Building reusable services & libraries for future use 3) Optimizing application for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable API 4) Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code

work.title: Software Enginner
work.description: For most of my time at Eastern Enterprise Pvt.Ltd, I have worked as a Nodejs Software Engineer. Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our Microservices. I have worked extensively with NodeJS and Express framework as well as with Loopback.

work.title: Software Enginner
work.description: My very first industrial experience felt like uncharted territory. I learned all the basics of Backend like deployment, CI/CD, SSL, etc.

projects.title: Smirkspace

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Manoj on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Manoj excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Ashish Payal - Senior Software Enginner at Wisen Technology
